A version of '''Minecraft Infdev'''<ref>{{ytl|89QfjjuhJyw|Minecraft - Strange Map Corruption|TKMinecraft|June 30, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{link |url=http://www.moddb.com/games/minecraft/images/stairs-and-the-new-offline-client1 |date=June 30, 2010 |title=stairs and the new offline client |website=ModDB}}</ref> was released on June 30, 2010,<ref>[[thewordofnotch:754041531|"I fixed a few bugs in /game/, and the game is now playable offline"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], June 30, 2010</ref> at 18:35 UTC. It is the second of two versions released on June 30, 2010, during the [[Infdev]] phase of development. [[Notch]] retroactively decided upon the release of [[Alpha v1.0.1]] that the versions from this day were now part of the new [[Java Edition Alpha|Alpha]] phase.<ref>[[wordofnotch:763147353|Seecret Friday update the third! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, July 3, 2010</ref> This is the last version to include [[gear]]s.

== Changes ==
=== World generation ===
'''General'''
* Changed sand and gravel generation.

=== General ===
'''[[Coordinates]]'''
* Spawn Y is set to 64 if it is at or below 0.
